attributes.action: Increase wage for all care staff including private sector and backdate it
attributes.additional_details: Because of all our hard work during the pandemic

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for wages in the private sector. 

You might like to sign and share these petitions:

Pay rise for NHS and care staff - https://.petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313488

Ensure that the national minimum wage is a living wage. - 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306660

Give all key workers a 100% tax and Nat. Ins. holiday through COVID-19 crisis - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

Pay bonus to all key workers - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
